summary: This document is a warranty deed transferring ownership of a parcel of land on Little St. James Island in the U.S. Virgin Islands from a group of individuals represented by Creque Estates, Inc. to Arch W. Cummin for $470,000. The deed outlines the rights and responsibilities of both parties regarding the property.

persons.name: Valerie Creque Rawson Nutting
persons.context: Valerie Creque Rawson Nutting is one of the individuals transferring ownership of the property.

persons.context: Alda Creque is the president of Creque Estates, Inc. and acted as the attorney-in-fact for the grantors in this transaction.

connections.description: Alda Creque is the president of Creque Estates, Inc., which represents the grantors in this transaction.
Valerie Creque Rawson Nutting is one of the grantors represented by Alda Creque.
Arch W. Cummin is the buyer of the property from Valerie Creque Rawson Nutting and others.

locations: Little St. James Island, U.S. Virgin Islands
19 East 88th Street, New York, New York 10028
keyFacts: The property on Little St. James Island was sold for $470,000.
Alda Creque acted as the attorney-in-fact for the group of grantors.
The deed includes covenants and restrictions as per Virgin Islands laws.
